summary: Code sets up a Telnet connection using a specific port and address, likely for communication between VirtualBox serial ports.

details.comment: Code sets up a Telnet connection using a specific port and address, likely for communication between VirtualBox serial ports.
details.content:
use telnet. port is specifically chosen.
the address is a numerical value.
TCP Server: Deselect the Connect to Existing Pipe/Socket check box and specify the port number in the Path/Address field. This is typically 23 or 2023. Note that on UNIX-like systems you will have to use a port a number greater than 1024 for regular users. 
https://docs.oracle.com/en/virtualization/virtualbox/6.0/user/serialports.html
